location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: File F/4 'Miscellaneous notifications and proclamations from the Municipalities'

physicalDescription.extent: The files are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 357; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 3-261; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence and public notices issued from the Manama Municipality. The bulk of the file consists of public notices on municipal ordinances relating to public works, safety, health, roads, traffic, and other municipal matters. Some files contain ordinances or correspondence from the Muharraq municipality.
